branchCategory.name: HRSH, Large Capacity, High Efficiency Inverter Chiller, Water-cooled 200VAC
branchCategory.description: <P>HRSH Water-cooled recirculating chillers offer a cooling capacity range of 11.5 to 24 kW. Coolant and refrigeration circuits are included in a compact and lightweight package. Extracted heat is water cooled. An inverter provides demand-based rotation control for the compressor, pump and fan (air cooled model), offering substantial energy savings. Electric options ensure global power supply compatibility. Additional features include a heating function, a low-maintenance seal-less immersion pump, and IPX4 rating for outdoor installation. </P>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacities: 11.5 kW, 15.7 kW, 20.6 kW, 24 kW <LI>Temperature range setting: 5 to 35°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.1°C <LI>Power supply requirement: 3-phase 200 VAC, 50Hz or 3-phase 200 ~ 230 VAC, 60Hz <LI>Waterproof specification: IPX4 <LI>Circulating fluid: Tap or deionized water, or 15% ethylene glycol solution </LI></UL>
